author: erayack
content:
Could you explain the pruning method used in Geth? Is it similar to this idea?
https://twitter.com/peter_szilagyi/status/1687389365859713024
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4444

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: No they are different, our pruning relates to state while 4444 relates to history pruning
